            <string language="en">This illustration shows a family of humans. Humans belong to the species Homo sapiens.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Familie der Menschen.

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une famille des

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma família dos seres

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una famiglia degli

            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μια οικογένεια των

            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a familia de seres
